data.text:
New Year's had passed. Cesario had 
challenged the 『Kanchiku Sho』――and she had won!
data.processed:
<story>New Year's had passed. Cesario had 
<story>challenged the 『Kanchiku Sho』――and she had won!

data.text:
(Alright……! She's won in a race with several 
Triple Crown participants, and it was even a 
medium distance 2000m race. With this……!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Alright……! She's won in a race with several 
<story>Triple Crown participants, and it was even a 
<story>medium distance 2000m race. With this……!)

data.text:
Congratulations on winning the 『Kanchiku Sho』, 
Cesario. As I thought, it seems like your strength 
is more towards slightly longer distances.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Congratulations on winning the 『Kanchiku Sho』, 
<story>Cesario. As I thought, it seems like your strength 
<story>is more towards slightly longer distances.

data.text:
Congratulations on winning the 『Kanchiku Sho』, 
Cesario. As I thought, it seems like your strength 
is more towards slightly longer distances.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Congratulations on winning the 『Kanchiku Sho』, 
<story>Cesario. As I thought, it seems like your strength 
<story>is more towards slightly longer distances.

data.text:
I want you to enter another major race in preparation 
for your main goal of the 『Oka Sho』. So let's 
have you run in the 1800m 『Flower Cup』 next!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I want you to enter another major race in preparation 
<story>for your main goal of the 『Oka Sho』. So let's 
<story>have you run in the 1800m 『Flower Cup』 next!

data.text:
And then Kraft. You can show more of your abilities in shorter 
races. So let's have you run in the 1400m 『Fillies' Review』.
data.name: <username>

choices.text: Let's work to our next goals!

data.processed:
<story>And then Kraft. You can show more of your abilities in shorter 
<story>races. So let's have you run in the 1400m 『Fillies' Review』.

data.text:
And then Kraft. You can show more of your abilities in shorter 
races. So let's have you run in the 1400m 『Fillies' Review』.
data.name: <username>

choices.text: Let's work to our next goals!

data.processed:
<story>And then Kraft. You can show more of your abilities in shorter 
<story>races. So let's have you run in the 1400m 『Fillies' Review』.

data.text: Yes!!
data.name: Kraft & Cesario
data.processed: <story>Yes!!

data.text:
(After the Fillies' Review, the 『Oka Sho』 
is the month after……And that's the first time…… 
I'll face Cesario in an official race)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(After the Fillies' Review, the 『Oka Sho』 
<story>is the month after……And that's the first time…… 
<story>I'll face Cesario in an official race)

data.text:
(The first time, with all my strength! That I'll 
be able to battle against Cesario……! I'm looking 
forward to it……I don't think I can wait……!)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(The first time, with all my strength! That I'll 
<story>be able to battle against Cesario……! I'm looking 
<story>forward to it……I don't think I can wait……!)

data.text:
Allllright! I need to put my all in to training―― 
Wait, huh? ……Over there, that's……
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Allllright! I need to put my all in to training―― 
<story>Wait, huh? ……Over there, that's……

data.text:
Haa, haa, haa…… 
Okay……――Haaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa, haa…… 
<story>Okay……――Haaaaaaaaa!!

data.text: !! ――Aaaaaaahh!!
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>!! ――Aaaaaaahh!!

data.text:
(Cesario!? Amazing……against Special Week-san……a senpai 
from the Golden Generation, she can keep up……!?)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(Cesario!? Amazing……against Special Week-san……a senpai 
<story>from the Golden Generation, she can keep up……!?)

data.text:
Not yet, not yet……! 
Yaaaaaaaaaーーーー!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Not yet, not yet……! 
<story>Yaaaaaaaaaーーーー!!

data.text:
(Spe-san……! How sharp……so that's the finishing strength of the 
Uma Musume called the "Supreme Command of Japan"……! ……But――)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(Spe-san……! How sharp……so that's the finishing strength of the 
<story>Uma Musume called the "Supreme Command of Japan"……! ……But――)

data.text:
Haa, haa, haa――! 
Haaaaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa, haa――! 
<story>Haaaaaaaaaaa!!

data.text:
(Against that strength! Against that speed, 
she's still hanging in……! She's evolving! 
By chasing Spe-san and learning more and more――)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(Against that strength! Against that speed, 
<story>she's still hanging in……! She's evolving! 
<story>By chasing Spe-san and learning more and more――)

data.text:
Can I……as a leader, can I out run that? 
Against……a finish like that――
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Can I……as a leader, can I out run that? 
<story>Against……a finish like that――

data.text:
(Not good! 『Looking forward to it』? Now's not the time to be 
thinking naively about that……I need to get more serious!)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(Not good! 『Looking forward to it』? Now's not the time to be 
<story>thinking naively about that……I need to get more serious!)

data.text:
(Against a last spurt like that…… 
I need to do something to fight back……!)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(Against a last spurt like that…… 
<story>I need to do something to fight back……!)

data.text:
……Then, I need to find an Uma Musume with overwhelming 
finishing strength too――……that's right, in that case!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>……Then, I need to find an Uma Musume with overwhelming 
<story>finishing strength too――……that's right, in that case!!

data.text:
Hmm, hmm, hmmmmm~……♪ So busy, so busy. 
Let's see, the next materials I need now are~……
data.processed:
<story>Hmm, hmm, hmmmmm~……♪ So busy, so busy. 
<story>Let's see, the next materials I need now are~……

data.text:
Ah, I found you……! 
Um, excuse me!! ――Sweep Tosho-san!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Ah, I found you……! 
<story>Um, excuse me!! ――Sweep Tosho-san!!

data.text:
I know it's a bit sudden! W-will you……! 
Will you do some parallel running with me!?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>I know it's a bit sudden! W-will you……! 
<story>Will you do some parallel running with me!?

data.text: Ha? What are you saying all of a sudden? No way!
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed: <story>Ha? What are you saying all of a sudden? No way!

data.text:
So quick!? U-um, can you think about it a little bit……? 
I really want to……I need to get stronger……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>So quick!? U-um, can you think about it a little bit……? 
<story>I really want to……I need to get stronger……!

data.text:
No waaay. It sounds annoying. 
And, right now I'm really busy.
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>No waaay. It sounds annoying. 
<story>And, right now I'm really busy.

data.text:
Au……I-is that so? 
Uuu……no……no even then, can you please reconsider?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Au……I-is that so? 
<story>Uuu……no……no even then, can you please reconsider?

data.text:
Hey, are you even listening to me!? 
I said no way, didn't I!? Nooo waaay!!
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>Hey, are you even listening to me!? 
<story>I said no way, didn't I!? Nooo waaay!!

data.text:
But, but! Can't you do something!? 
Please, Sweep-saaaaa~~~n!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>But, but! Can't you do something!? 
<story>Please, Sweep-saaaaa~~~n!!

data.text:
No means nooooo! You're so persistent! 
What's wrong with you～～～～!?
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>No means nooooo! You're so persistent! 
<story>What's wrong with you～～～～!?

data.text:
――Now, put the small blue flowers here, and the bulbs 
in that box over there in to a bottle. Right now!
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>――Now, put the small blue flowers here, and the bulbs 
<story>in that box over there in to a bottle. Right now!

data.text:
Okay! ……Um, and so, 
after I finish helping with this……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Okay! ……Um, and so, 
<story>after I finish helping with this……!

data.text:
I get it. All I have to do is run for you right!? Geez-…… 
you're really stubborn, you know. Just saying no is more exhausting!
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>I get it. All I have to do is run for you right!? Geez-…… 
<story>you're really stubborn, you know. Just saying no is more exhausting!

data.text:
Ahaha, actually, I get told that alot……sorry~. 
So, these flowers……and bulbs……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha, actually, I get told that alot……sorry~. 
<story>So, these flowers……and bulbs……!

data.text:
Okay, all done! ……is all this, 
preparation for a new large-scale magic?
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Okay, all done! ……is all this, 
<story>preparation for a new large-scale magic?

data.text:
Hm? Well, it does kind of give off that feeling…… 
Oh, so you, know about something like this?
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>Hm? Well, it does kind of give off that feeling…… 
<story>Oh, so you, know about something like this?

data.text:
Of course……! Sweep Tosho-san. 
……you're an Uma Musume who's shown us what 『Race Magic』 is.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Of course……! Sweep Tosho-san. 
<story>……you're an Uma Musume who's shown us what 『Race Magic』 is.

data.text:
Last year……before challenging the Triple Tiara rotation, you 
said something like this: 『This boring world, I'll change it』.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Last year……before challenging the Triple Tiara rotation, you 
<story>said something like this: 『This boring world, I'll change it』.

data.text:
『Triple Crown Uma Musume are stronger than Triple 
Tiara Uma Musume, is what you're saying~?]
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>『Triple Crown Uma Musume are stronger than Triple 
<story>Tiara Uma Musume, is what you're saying~?]

data.text:
『When they compete together in Senior class races, 
the Tiara girls have always lost. That's what it seems 
like when you think about it rationally?』
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>『When they compete together in Senior class races, 
<story>the Tiara girls have always lost. That's what it seems 
<story>like when you think about it rationally?』

data.text:
『What's with that, it's so booooooring! 
That's something an idiot would conclude!』
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>『What's with that, it's so booooooring! 
<story>That's something an idiot would conclude!』

data.text:
『In that case, I'll show all of you! First, I'll 
start by competing in the Triple Tiara rotation――』
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>『In that case, I'll show all of you! First, I'll 
<story>start by competing in the Triple Tiara rotation――』

data.text:
『And then, in the Senior Class! And even in a 
Grand Prix, the Takarazuka Kinen! I'll compete 
against the Triple Crown girls, and win!』
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>『And then, in the Senior Class! And even in a 
<story>Grand Prix, the Takarazuka Kinen! I'll compete 
<story>against the Triple Crown girls, and win!』

data.text:
『And then, for idiots like you, I'll even cast my 
magic. Races aren't a boring place like that!』
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>『And then, for idiots like you, I'll even cast my 
<story>magic. Races aren't a boring place like that!』

data.text:
『It doesn't matter if it's the Triple Crown or the Triple Tiara! 
Strong Uma Musume are strong! I'll show all of you!』
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>『It doesn't matter if it's the Triple Crown or the Triple Tiara! 
<story>Strong Uma Musume are strong! I'll show all of you!』

data.text:
That press conference……I've watched it so many times. Again, 
and again……each and every time, it resonated in my heart.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>That press conference……I've watched it so many times. Again, 
<story>and again……each and every time, it resonated in my heart.

data.text:
『Triple Crown or Triple Tiara, doesn't matter』 
『A strong Uma Musume is strong』……! I believe 
that too. I want to prove that too. That's why……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>『Triple Crown or Triple Tiara, doesn't matter』 
<story>『A strong Uma Musume is strong』……! I believe 
<story>that too. I want to prove that too. That's why……!

data.text:
Please! I need to continue evolving now. 
For the 『Oka Sho』……so I can beat my rival……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Please! I need to continue evolving now. 
<story>For the 『Oka Sho』……so I can beat my rival……!

data.text:
Hmmm? ……so you're not just persistent, 
you're a kind of interesting girl too.
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>Hmmm? ……so you're not just persistent, 
<story>you're a kind of interesting girl too.

data.text:
So, you're saying that you've fallen under my spell? 
……In that case, having you stay weak would be troubling!
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>So, you're saying that you've fallen under my spell? 
<story>……In that case, having you stay weak would be troubling!

data.text:
I guess it can't be helped. 
I suppose it's fine to start some parallel running!
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>I guess it can't be helped. 
<story>I suppose it's fine to start some parallel running!

data.text:
Haaaaaaaaaa! 
Yaaaaaーーーー!
data.name: Kraft & Sweep
data.processed:
<story>Haaaaaaaaaa! 
<story>Yaaaaaーーーー!

data.text: (Kuu……! No……she's going to pass me……!!)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>(Kuu……! No……she's going to pass me……!!)

data.text:
Fuuu……! Well what do you know? You're pretty good! Your start 
is on point, and you hung in there quite well at the end.
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>Fuuu……! Well what do you know? You're pretty good! Your start 
<story>is on point, and you hung in there quite well at the end.

data.text:
T-thank you very much. 
But, in the end you were still able to pass me……
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>T-thank you very much. 
<story>But, in the end you were still able to pass me……

data.text:
Mu. Now you've said it……Against Sweepy, that's expected! 
And besides, I debuted a year earlier than you!
data.name: Sweep Tosho
data.processed:
<story>Mu. Now you've said it……Against Sweepy, that's expected! 
<story>And besides, I debuted a year earlier than you!

data.text:
That may be true but……! That won't be enough. If I can't 
keep up with someone that's able to finish like you then……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>That may be true but……! That won't be enough. If I can't 
<story>keep up with someone that's able to finish like you then……!

data.text: Haaaaaa……!!
data.name: Spe & Cesario
data.processed: <story>Haaaaaa……!!

data.text:
(Against that finish……against that sharpness! 
If I stay like this……honestly, no matter how far 
in front I go, I don't think it'll be enough……!)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(Against that finish……against that sharpness! 
<story>If I stay like this……honestly, no matter how far 
<story>in front I go, I don't think it'll be enough……!)

data.text:
(I can't imagine it!! 
I can't imagine winning against Cesario……!)
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>(I can't imagine it!! 
<story>I can't imagine winning against Cesario……!)

data.text:
Once more……please, Sweep-san. 
Like this, I don't think it'll be enough……!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Once more……please, Sweep-san. 
<story>Like this, I don't think it'll be enough……!
